eu_initiatives: Air Quality, Transport, Emissions, Transport White Paper, Clean Vehicles, activities of DG MOVE "Clean Transport Urban Transport" unit.
organisation_name: Sadler Consultants / Sadler Consultants Ltd / Sadler Consultants GmbH i.G. (SC0 / SCL / SCG)
goals__remit:
Air Quality Consultants support clean air and transport, particularly in the field of Urban Access Regulations and Low Emission Zones. Support public authorities on access regulations. 
I run an EU-wide Urban Access Regulation Scheme Platform and website on behalf of DG MOVE, with public authority members and information for the public on urban access regulations. http://urbanaccessregulations.eu/
legal_status: Self employed person as well as Limited Company
